articles.content: Physicist and author Stephen Hawking, who has died aged 76, possessed an uncanny ability to come up with memorable phrases and sayings that summed up his world view. Here is a short selection of his … [+1617 chars]

articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: UAE announces 100-year plan to finish building ‘first city on Mars’ by 2117 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The United Arab Emirates (UAE) will build the first city on the Red Planet as part of the 2117 Mars project in collaboration with specialised international organisations and scientific institutes.
articles.content:
